authors.name: Kanae  Nishii
authors.affiliation: Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh; Kanagawa University

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cu06j","text":"Third generation NGS long-read sequences become popular for draft genome assembly. Here, we developed an efficient plant chloroplast assembly tool for whole genome assemblies from long-read datasets. This pipeline could be used also for mitochondrial genome assembly if the coverage is sufficiently high. The PLCL pipeline works on an assembled draft genome.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8obkf","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqe6a","text":"Summary of the PLCL pipeline","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78an6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73pbl","text":"Step 1: Creating a blastn database of the draft genome assembly and search for target sequences","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ijgd","text":"            (chloroplast or mitochondria) as the queries.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a8bq","text":"Step 2: Checking the coverage (mean depth) of each contig in the draft genome using minimap2 and samtools.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":84,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":97,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa3t9","text":"Step 3: Combining the results from step 1 (“blast_out.tsv”) and step 2 (“coverage.tsv”).","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsuv6","text":"Step 4: Optional: k-means analyses for clustering the draft genome contigs with the Perl Algorithm::KMeans package.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":18,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":89,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lvo1","text":"Step 5: Optional: Visualizing blastn bitscore and samtoolscoverage data by R ggplot2.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":30,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":50,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":77,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a16j5","text":"Step 6: Selecting chloroplast contigs from the results of blastn, samtools coverage, and output of k-means analyses.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":58,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":66,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1io72","text":"Step 7: Extracting the chloroplast / mitochondrial reads from the bam file created in step 2.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4a4j1","text":"Step 8: Assembling reads into chloroplast / mitochondrial genomes.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ceg8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ei3n","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"296mj","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dursh","text":"This pipeline worked for Streptocarpus rexiichloroplast and mitochondrial genome assembly with Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) long-read sequencing datasets. The pipeline was also tested with Arabidopsis thaliana and Orysa sativa long-read sequencing datasets, and the chloroplast genomes of these model plants were successfully assembled.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":25,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":195,"length":20},{"style":"italic","offset":220,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1bbq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3d6l","text":"This protocol shows the details of the PLCL chloroplast genome assembly using Arabidopsis thaliana “KBS-Mac-74” ONT reads (ERR2173373; Michael et al. 2018).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":78,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23f6e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"but3l","text":"Programs involved","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sacn","text":"SRA Toolkit keywords: ,blastn, contig coverage, mitochondrial genome assembly, Oxford Nanopore Technologies long-read sequencing, plant chloroplast genome assembly, samtools
manuscript_citation: Nishii K, Hart M, Kelso N, Barber S, Chen Y-Y, Thomson M, Trivedi U, Twyford A D, Möller M (2022) The first genome for the Cape Primrose Streptocarpus rexii (Gesneriaceae), a model plant for studying meristem-driven shoot diversity. Plant Direct (in prep)

histogram","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gjp5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5og7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do1lv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3476d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9418,"name":"NanoPlot \
        -t 8 \
        --fastq $HOME/ONT_genome_raw.fastq.gz \
        -o OUTPUT_dir_raw \
        --raw \
        --store","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"","description":null,"can_edit":1,"guid":"7295FF4D177411EC8B1A0A58A9FEAC02"}},"1":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9419,"name":"library(ggplot2)
df <- read.table("NanoPlot-data.tsv", header = T)
ONT <- ggplot(df, aes(x=lengths)) + geom_histogram(bins=1000) +
  scale_x_log10(limits=c(1,1000000),labels=scales::comma) +
  ylim(0,10000) +
  xlab("Read_length") +
  ylab("Number_of_reads")+
  theme(text=element_text(size=20))+
  geom_vline(xintercept = c(3500), linetype="dashed", color="yellow")
ggsave("ONT.emf",plot=ONT)","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"","description":"R script","can_edit":1,"guid":"B8DB7CC0177411ECB835DD58CB26D7A8"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6k9r1","text":"Searching for chloroplast contigs using blastn","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":40,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehqm1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fq1b5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95pri","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cr7io","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9424,"name":"blastn \\\n        -db Atont.ctg_db \\\n        -query AtChloRef.fasta \\\n        -evalue 0.1 \\\n        -outfmt \"6 sacc evalue bitscore\" \\\n        -out blast_out.tsv","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"","description":null,"can_edit":1,"guid":"4A350050177611ECB835DD58CB26D7A8"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7i3ul","text":"Aligning raw ONT reads to the draft genome assembly using minimap2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":58,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f66l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sbi5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ii4i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fq19r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9425,"name":"minimap2 -ax map-ont Atont.ctg.fasta ERR2173373.fastq.gz \u003e ontasm.sam","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"","description":null,"can_edit":1,"guid":"8B92B470177611ECB835DD58CB26D7A8"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an1uv","text":"Calculating coverage with samtools","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c8cg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajtnp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jhv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cgfr2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9426,"name":"samtools sort -o ontasm.bam -@ 8 ontasm.sam \u0026\u0026 \\\nsamtools index ontasm.bam \u0026\u0026 \\\nsamtools coverage -o coverage.tsv ontasm.bam","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"","description":null,"can_edit":1,"guid":"AB873F30177611ECB835DD58CB26D7A8"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bij00","text":"Combine the results of k means analyses to the “hitcontig_cov.u.csv” and save as “chlo_u.km.csv”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":23,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96nis","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s1jo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8rhp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23nim","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dn9qj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"7DD9C4D0177C11ECB835DD58CB26D7A8","height":202,"id":223845,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":21,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"c8krb","text":"Example result file: \"chlo_u.km.csv\"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g4vhbcmf7.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g4vfbcmf7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g4vgbcmf7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g4vebcmf7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27i8l","text":"Visualizing blastn bitscore and samtools coverage data by R ggplot2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":32,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":60,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq88a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4q4e","text":"Plot the data "chlo_u.km.csv" from step 4 in R.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38f6c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6s6l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82fc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fk5ap","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9433,"name":"#load libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(ggrepel)

#load chloroplast data
chlo <- read.csv("chlo_u.km.csv")
colnames(chlo)[5] <- "kmeans_k0"
colnames(chlo)[6] <- "kmeans_k5"
chlo$coverage <- as.numeric(chlo$coverage)
colnames(chlo)

#display k=0 plot without labels
ggplot(chlo) +
  aes(x=bitscore,y=coverage)+
  geom_point(mapping = aes(color=kmeans_k0),size=4) +
  geom_point(colour="gray90",size=0.01)+
  scale_x_log10(limits=c(1,1000000),labels=scales::comma)+
  scale_y_log10(limits=c(0.1,1e4))+
  theme(text=element_text(size=20))

#display k=0 plot with labels > 50 coverage
ggplot(chlo) +
  aes(x=bitscore,y=coverage)+
  geom_point(mapping = aes(color=kmeans_k0),size=4) +
  geom_point(colour="gray90",size=0.01)+
  scale_x_log10(limits=c(1,1000000),labels=scales::comma)+
  scale_y_log10(limits=c(0.1,1e4))+
  theme(text=element_text(size=20))+
  geom_label_repel(data=chlo %>% filter(coverage>50),aes(label=tig),nudge_x=0.1,nudge_y=0.2)

#save k = 0 plot with labels > 50 coverage
c0 <- ggplot(chlo) +
  aes(x=bitscore,y=coverage)+
  geom_point(mapping = aes(color=kmeans_k0),size=4) +
  geom_point(colour="gray90",size=0.01)+
  scale_x_log10(limits=c(1,1000000),labels=scales::comma)+
  scale_y_log10(limits=c(0.1,1e4))+
  theme(text=element_text(size=20))+
  geom_label_repel(data=chlo %>% filter(coverage>50),aes(label=tig),nudge_x=0.1,nudge_y=0.2)
ggsave("At_chlo_k0.svg",c0)

#save k = 5 plot with labels > 50 coverage
c5 <- ggplot(chlo) +
  aes(x=bitscore,y=coverage)+
  geom_point(mapping = aes(color=kmeans_k5),size=4) +
  geom_point(colour="gray90",size=0.01)+
  scale_x_log10(limits=c(1,1000000),labels=scales::comma)+
  scale_y_log10(limits=c(0.1,1e4))+
  theme(text=element_text(size=20))+
  geom_label_repel(data=chlo %>% filter(coverage>50),aes(label=tig),nudge_x=0.1,nudge_y=0.2)
ggsave("At_chlo_k5.svg",c5)","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"","description":"R script","can_edit":1,"guid":"2FEB8DC0177D11ECB835DD58CB26D7A8"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"nu5p","text":"Select chloroplast contigs from the results of blastn, samtools coverage, and k-means analyses.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":47,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":55,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":78,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"139aj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8el6u","text":"Create a txt file of the list of contig name (\"list.txt\")","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26vem","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hln","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7b4tt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"909E7F60177D11ECB835DD58CB26D7A8","height":86,"id":223849,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":23,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"db47l","text":"Example \"list.txt\" file","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g4vmbcmf7.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g4vjbcmf7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g4vkbcmf7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g4vibcmf7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vemu","text":"Extracting the chloroplast / mitochondrial reads from the bam file created in step 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jlpq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vmgq","text":"Locate "list.txt" in the working directory ($PWD) and run the commands "read_extract.sh".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"950na","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70sbf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7ti2","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7e7oj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9434,"name":"mkdir $PWD/tempbam
for i in $(cat $PWD/list.txt);
do
        samtools view \
                -F 16 \
                -b \
                -o $PWD/tempbam/"$i".bam \
                $PWD/ontasm.bam \
                "$i"
done &&\
samtools merge $PWD/ontasm_filt.bam \
        -f \
        $PWD/tempbam/* && \
samtools fasta \
        $PWD/ontasm_filt.bam \
        -F 4 > \
        ontasm_filt.reads.fa","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"read_extract.sh","description":null,"can_edit":1,"guid":"EFE81D00177D11ECB835DD58CB26D7A8"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cncc","text":"Assembling reads into chloroplast / mitochondrial genomes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jo1r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7q66","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6gntl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9435,"name":"canu \\\n-p Atont.chlo -d Atont_chloro_canu \\\nusegrid=false \\\ngenomeSize=0.15m \\\nminReadLength=12000 \\\nminOverlapLength=10000 \\\ncorMinCoverage=8 \\\ntrimReadsOverlap=100 \\\ntrimReadsCoverage=100 \\\nrawErrorRate=0.500 \\\ncorrectedErrorRate=0.144 \\\ncorOutCoverage=40 \\\nminInputCoverage=8 \\\nstopOnLowCoverage=8 \\\n-nanopore-raw ontasm_filt.reads.fa","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"","description":"canu example script","can_edit":1,"guid":"521EA160177E11ECB835DD58CB26D7A8"}}}}
